item.title: about me
item.description: You can download a copy of my resume here. education Bachelor of Applied Science in Honors Mechatronics Engineering with Co-op from the University of Waterloo, Waterloo, ON. (Class of 2022) skills the languages i’ve worked with (from most experience to least experience) are C# Python C++ C HLSL (Microsoft’s High-Level Shader Language) Java Go HTML, CSS, XML, Markdown Javascript SQL YAML the frameworks and libraries I’ve used are Unity NUnit, testNG ROS (Robot Operating System) Arduino Azure Jenkins Ansible Hugo Latex some of my other sills include

item.title: fun stuff i'm working on
item.description: If you want to see some of the code I’ve written, check out my Github profile. Farming Game I’m creating a tranquil and immersive 2D farming game set on a distant planet that combines my love for robotics and game development. I intend to leverage Unity’s Muse to create a visually enchanting experience for players. Eggstravaganza This was a game developed with some of my coworkers at Unity. It is a multiplayer game where you play as a gopher and try to collect more eggs than your opponents.

item.title: get in touch
item.description: The best way to contact me is through email. You can reach me at camille.h.walters@gmail.com Alternatively, you can find me on LinkedIn here.
